mapper.select: select organization from Members group by organization
select JOB_NAME from (select * from Members where organization=#{organization}) as job group by job_name
select name from Members where JOB_NAME=#{job_name};
select * from Members where organization=#{organization} and JOB_NAME=#{job_name}
select * from Members where organization=#{organization} and JOB_NAME=#{job_name} and name=#{name}

select b.*, #{oriBoardTitle} as board_title,case when b.seq = parent_seq then 'true' else 'false' end as favorite from ${board_title} b left join Favorite_Board f on id=#{id} and parent_seq = b.seq and board_title=#{board_title} order by seq desc

select b.*,#{oriBoardTitle} as board_title, "true" as favorite from Favorite_Board f left join ${board_title} b on parent_seq=b.seq where id=#{id} and board_title=#{board_title} order by write_date desc

(select b.seq,ori_board_title as board_title,id,parent_seq,title,writer,header,notice,contents,survey_question,view_count from Favorite_Board f inner join (${fromBoard}) b on parent_seq=b.seq and f.board_title=b.board_title and id=#{id} order by write_date desc) limit ${start},10;
select * from (select row_number() over(order by write_date desc) as rn, ${board_title}.* from ${board_title} where notice=true) as sub where rn between 1 and 5;
mapper.update: update ${board_title} set title=#{title}, header=#{header}, notice=#{notice}, contents=#{contents} where seq=#{seq}
